content.p: The clerk should also enter on the petition a certificate substantially in the following form: I certify that on the ________ day of ________________________, ________, I mailed to each of the following persons a copy of the within petition and process to his post office address as disclosed by the record: ________________________________________________________________________ ________________________________________________________________________ ________________________________________________________________________ and that advertisement has been published in accordance with law, a copy of said advertisement being hereto attached. This ________ day of ________________________, ________. ___________________________________________________________________ Clerk
